key.name: window-positions
key.description: Stores window positions and sizes as a dictionary mapping window keys to (x, y, width, height) tuples

key.name: window-monitors
key.description: Stores which monitor each window was on

key.name: window-timestamps
key.description: Stores when each window position was last saved (for cleanup)

key.name: restore-delay-ms
key.description: Delay before attempting to restore window position

key.name: max-restore-attempts
key.description: Number of times to attempt restoring window position

key.name: cleanup-days
key.description: Remove window position data older than this many days
